event.title: French Language Classes in Pune
event.description:
Introduction to French Language Course

French (Francais) is a language spoken in France, Belgium, Luxembourg and Switzerland. French as a foreign language is the second most frequently taught language in the world after English. In addition to English, it is the most used language in the European Commission. Additionally, a large number of words have been borrowed from French that are extensively used by English speakers. French is also an official language in communities and global organizations.

In Sevenmentor the French Language Classes in Pune, helps the learners in beating the aforementioned challenges with the help of its elegant teaching methodology and specialist faculties. Learners who want to pursue french classes in Pune rely on the experience of Sevenmentor to achieve complete fluency in languages. SevenMentor conducts weekday as well as weekend courses for all languages like Spanish, German and French classes in pune . Institute presents excellent faculties and focused study material which helps the learners in overcoming the common linguistic, habitual and mental challenges. Sevenmentor moulds them into people with multi linguistic capabilities that are prepared to participate in the changing real world.
event.address: Office number 45/B Wing , 2nd floor, Shreenath Plaza, 1st floor, Dnyaneshwar Paduka Chowk, F.C Road, Shivaji Nagar, Pune
